title: (x) "The Miracle on 13th Street" Christmas logo - ITC Edwardian Script {Rainer}
content:
Hi, was given a low-quality raster logo from a Christmas-themed customer and have no idea what the font is. You guys on here are awesome so I thought I’d give it a try… I will settle for a close match. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [miraclesmall.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20061202100403/http:/typophile.com/files/miraclesmall.jpg) | 6.79 KB |
author: Poke Alex

comments.content: You are welcome. Doesn’t that hurt, in your signature? ;-)
